Detailed Description

AbsoluteControllerParams are used by widgets to tell their AbsoluteController how they want to be laid out.

Per-child layout information associated with AbsoluteLayout.

For information about how to create and resolve AbsoluteControllerParams, reference to AbsoluteController.
